name: Comet (Geru Games)
description:
--Controls--

  • R - Restart Level.
  • Q - Return to Menu
  • D + E + L - Reset your data.
  • Left Mouse Button - Click and hold to charge up power, let go to release!  You'll fire in the direction of your mouse pointer.
  • Right Mouse Button - Click to cancel your charge.

--Gameplay--

Fly your way through the galaxy blasting through every star that you can find!  Not every star is going to be a straight shot, however.  Your comet also isn't a enduring  one, you need to reach each star in one shot!  You may even need to try many different angles of approach to reach your destination!  Can you clear all 18 levels?

--Post Mortem--

Crazy Golf was a much easier theme than Life is Short definitely.  I was feeling way more inspired and was able to get a prototype up and running much faster than the previous Game Jam.  After establishing a visual style I got to work on fixing up the mechanics and the game quickly came together.  I spent most of the beginning of the jam programming.  The later half doing level design and the art.  I think this game turned out great.  I was even able to get a lot more sound effects done this time around.  However, I've yet to have a good way of producing music for my games, I'll be working on that in future projects of mine.

--Bugs--

If you encounter any bugs please report them in the comments!  Although I think it should be bug free.
